scripts.release-linux-ia32: node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --target_platform=linux --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=ia32 --target_platform=linux --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && npm run publish
scripts.release-linux: node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 --target_platform=linux && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && npm run publish
scripts.release-win-ia32: node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=ia32 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && npm run publish
scripts.release-win: node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && node-pre-gyp package --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=win32 --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && npm run publish
scripts.release: node-pre-gyp rebuild --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell && node-pre-gyp package --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && npm run publish
scripts.release-darwin: HOME=~/.electron-gyp node-pre-gyp rebuild --target_platform=darwin --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 --arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell && node-pre-gyp package --target_platform=darwin --runtime=electron --target=4.0.3 && npm run publish
